noDatasetsMessage.authenticated: This collection currently has no datasets. You can add to it by using the Add Data button on this page.

noItemsMessage.authenticated: This collection currently has no {{typeOfEmptyItems}}. You can add to it by using the Add Data button on this page.

noSearchMatches: There are no collections, datasets, or files that match your search. Please try a new search by using other or broader terms. You can also check out the <anchor>search guide</anchor> for tips.
createdAlert: You have successfully created your collection! To learn more about what you can do with your collection, check out the <anchor>User Guide</anchor>.

publish.title: Publish Collection
publish.question: Are you sure you want to publish your collection? Once you do so it must remain published.
publish.error: There was an error publishing your collection.

share.helpText: Share this collection on your favorite social media networks.
